outputs.name: stdout
text:
[33mYou are using pip version 10.0.1, however version 18.1 is available.
You should consider upgrading via the 'pip install --upgrade pip' command.[0m

source:
from mobilechelonian import Turtle
t=Turtle()
#head
def circle_object(radius,angle):
    t.circle(radius,angle)
circle_object(25,360)

#body and hands
t.right(90)
t.forward(50)
t.right(135)
t.forward(50)
t.right(180)
t.forward(50)
t.left(90)
t.forward(50)
t.right(180)
t.forward(50)
t.left(45)

#skirt
t.left(30)
t.forward(100)
t.right(120)
t.forward(100)
t.right(120)
t.forward(100)
t.right(180)
t.forward(100)
t.left(120)
t.forward(40)

#legs
t.right(90)
t.forward(40)
t.left(90)
t.forward(5)
t.left(90)
t.forward(40)
t.right(90)
t.forward(5)
t.right(90)
t.forward(40)
t.left(90)
t.forward(5)
t.left(90)
t.forward(40)
t.right(90)
t.forward(45)

t.left(120)
t.forward(100)
t.right(30)
